title: Tintin Megapack
description:
Tintin Megapack

Adventures of Tintin (complete)

1. All comics complete
2. All videos complete (in avi format)
3. All subtitles for videos if one finds spoken english difficult. These subtitles are in *.srt format in a separate folder. You will have to use VLC player or KM Player, to be able to play subtitles or any other player supporting the subtitle feature.
4. Tintin - The complete companion by Michael Farr, John Murray, 2001. ISBN 0-7195-5522-1 (complete book in pdf form)
5. Tintin unofficial and unreleased comics such as "Tintin and the mysterious visitor", "Tintin in Thailand", "Tintin -the freelance reporter", "Tintin and the_voice of the lagoon" and many others!
6. Lot of other valuable material related to Tintin you never knew existed!!

Enjoy!
